website_summaries.verdict: Invict is specially formulated to attract German roaches, which are known for being bait-averse.
pros: Formulation contains 11 attractants that draw even bait-averse German roaches
The active ingredient, Imidacloprid, targets German roaches
Works well placed behind stove, under refrigerator, and around plumbing joints
Makes a difference in 24 hours to 1 week
cons: Hardens in a few days and loses its effectiveness

website_summaries.verdict: Specialized gel bait that targets German roaches, to be used in conjunction with other roach bait as part of population control program.
pros: Special formula contains 11 attractants and active ingredient imidacloprid to target German roaches, which are usually bait averse
Acts quickly, and works well in conjunction with other types of roach bait as an overall program of roach control
cons: It's most effective when used in conjunction with other bait or insecticide

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to kill German roaches, I was using a different company gel which was working great but I thought the bugs might get immune to the taste. With this gel not one single roach tried to eat it, I know because I use clear plastic traps. Would never recommend this and I just waisted my money with one use in 10 traps. Gave only 1 star because I couldn’t post review without it.
customer_reviews.author: June F.

customer_reviews.title: Money savor
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works only a month since I bought it and the bugs are dead. I had some water damage and they almost took over found this on YouTube. Had been using a company to spray and it only got worse. The pear control company got me saying it would take a few times to spray before I saw results 75.00 each was like giving the bugs food. Try this with the genteel patch looks like birth control for bugs. I used half a tube and 3 patches You will not be sorry wish I bought it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I read multiple reviews from different sources saying that this stuff is the best and works wonders, I found out that this is not the truth. The stuff I buy from the Box store like Lowe's and Home Dept work much better and solve my problem. Tried this product for over 2 months and no change. Bought stuff from my local box store and had results in under a month. Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Your problems are almost solved.
customer_reviews.text: Killed em ALL dead in under one month. This is amazing, you NEED this to do battle with the German Roaches. Pair it with the Insect Growth Regulator and Ortho Home Defense, and your worries are all over. You can rest assured, I read all the reviews and did all the work for you, and the tried and true method is THE one I just laid out for you. Order these 3 things now, and your nightmare will soon be over. Adding on: its been two months since I wrote the original review, all bugs are STILL gone! Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Against German cockroaches - 100% effective!!
customer_reviews.text: Recently acquired a German cockroach nest from outta the blue. They spread fast (kinda like fleas) and get into everything that even used to be food. This stuff is excellent! I've only been using it in a limited area and the little buggers are being found dead everywhere. I don't know if this is reaching the nest(s) but its HIGHLY effective if you place it in the areas you most see them. Be careful that your pets cant' get to the places you put this gel in!! Let the bugs tell you where to put it and keep a journal of where it is (so you can clean it up when they're gone).
customer_reviews.author: Mac from KC MO

customer_reviews.title: This works!!
customer_reviews.text: You must reapply every 3-4 months, but it works. We moved into a house with a mild infestation in the kitchen. We have a baby and 3 three nosy dogs so I was hesitant to use a broad spectrum insecticide. 6 months out we rarely see any roaches, but I have applied the bait underneath, and behind everything in the kitchen twice. Tip: when you apply a new round of bait, pop off the old dried up bits and trash them. Get the back of your fridge where the fan exhaust is warm and dark, they love that spot.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Shelton

customer_reviews.title: For this product I have to give it a five star!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very effective! I am learning chemistry during my undergraduate and graduate study! The chemicals inside is very useful to kill the insects. After use it for two weeks, I no longer can see any roachs in my kitchen which shows a much better effect than Bayer's product. And for a whole year, I never see these insects come back! I will continue to use this product if I meet any in my new place. Recommend for other people facing the same stiuation!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my german cockroach infestation
customer_reviews.text: Applied according to instructions, extremely liberally. Over the next few weeks, the product was so ineffective that it almost seemed an encouragement to them. I had enacted a rigorous cleaning program and laid some physical traps (roach motels) as well, but over the following weeks, it almost seemed that this encouraged them - they started to appear much more frequently and seemed larger and more robust.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Witkowski

customer_reviews.title: Roaches won't eat it, but you can crush them with the cardboard box this comes in
customer_reviews.text: Update: Mixing this stuff into a slurry by squirting a big blob onto tin foil and adding water seems pretty effective. Left a few of those out while out of town and came back to lots of dead roaches. This should be on the box instructions though. Used by itself: Set out a few blobs in my living room and haven't seen roaches go for it, but they pop right out as soon as I bring out food for myself! This stuff is total crap, even worse because it's expensive. Only thing that seems to work is dusting litte bits of food with borax powder, which is also a lot cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Alright, this is a no-nonsense, real and accurate ...
customer_reviews.text: Alright, this is a no-nonsense, real and accurate review. I had an impossible German Cockroach infestation against which I literally tried everything. I just received my order of Invict Gold last night and dabbed it all over as per the instructions without any real belief it would have any effect against these "super-bugs." This morning I awoke to a house full of dead and dying roaches everywhere. Thank you Jesus, thank you Amazon! If anyone wants to know what NOT to buy, the answer is anything else at all.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton D. Pollen MD

customer_reviews.title: Does not do anything
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work as the good reviews fully trumped the others. It dimples does not do what it states, and hardens within hours of application. I covered all the nooks and cracks in our infested kitchen, and the roaches still came marching right over the cemented yellow goo that was suppose to send them to another realm. Honestly I’d stick to sprays!
customer_reviews.author: AHays

customer_reviews.title: Truly is Gold 💜
customer_reviews.text: I have tried exterminators, all sorts of tips and tricks to get rid of cockroaches. Always spraying raid to kill the nests and the ones I see but they would keep coming back in waves. I have never seen a product work so well. The day after using it I watched bodies piling up and they are still stacking! They can't get enough of the stuff, and at this rate I feel my roach problem will be a thing of the past. Highly recommend this brand over the other tube roach poisons!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective for garage use
customer_reviews.text: It does kill some roaches. But my garage still has freakin roaches despite using this item as directed quite frequently. I’ve been using it over a year now... and I still have roaches. Sooooo id say not so effective. Doesn’t work as described. And no, neither my home nor garage are filthy and we don’t keep the trash cans inside. No reason for them to even be in there other than a tiny bit damp in inclement weather.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bait after reading the great reviews. Doesn't work! I captured a roach in a clear container and applied a bunch of this stuff all over. He completely avoided this stuff like he's aware it's poison. Found another roach behind the microwave, trapped him in a perimeter of this stuff, walked right over it without a reaction. I truly believe some of these sellers are supplying ineffective bootleg versions of this stuff, hence the large amount of good reviews mixed with some bad experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Trinidad Elias

customer_reviews.title: Evil Bugs thinks it is candy....
customer_reviews.text: they eat, take it to their nest, and without knowing; they just committed massive slaughter house in their own little nest. A little tiny dab at a corner, in a known crack and crevice. Little bit goes a long, long ways. Hate ants? Just put a small dab, near entry of their home. Observe! Curious little buggers zooms in, examines, and in sheer delight, it's candy to them. They eat and carry into the nest to share. and little do they know soon they will be dead! Congratulations, you have saved your World!
customer_reviews.author: Steppin' Time

customer_reviews.title: You got Germans? You need this.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Saw bugs during the day so I bought this product. I spread it like caulk in the high traffic areas, small dots in the less traffic areas. I only applied one time. It works on Germans, water bugs, palmettos, even the little circle ones. It's been three months, after the 3rd week I stopped seeing all roaches, even palmettos. Just now, in rainy season I might wake up to a dead palmetto somewhere in the house but it's S. Fla, can't stop that. Bought for.my M.i.L it worked so well. Buy this not some other crap.
customer_reviews.author: john valdespino

customer_reviews.title: Eureka! this thing actually works!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we put some in the kitchen counter edges and in the corners of the lower cabinets, after a few days later, we saw nothing, and then the other day we saw one with a egg hanging but she was truly drunk, she was walking so slow. So we let her go to carry it to her colony in the walls. This is a Condo complex surrounded by dirty young neighbors who lets their dishes pile up in their sinks... Thank you for a great product finally worth the money. and not spraying is the assurance to keep us safer...
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Just

customer_reviews.title: From infestation to zero German cockroaches
customer_reviews.text: We lost weeks of renters in our beach-front rental home due to German cockroaches. The management company kept sending out the same exterminating service who applied, over and over, the same spray that did nothing for the cockroaches. In desperation, we ordered this and the Dupont Advion Cockroach Bait Arenas, and within one week, there was not a single complaint about cockroaches, nor even a single sighting. We went from renters leaving our property due to German cockroaches, to them being completely gone. We are so thankful to find something that works.
customer_reviews.author: jetpilotjr

customer_reviews.title: KILLS THEM DEAD!
customer_reviews.text: I saw results within 4 hours. Four freaking hours. It was ugly and beautiful at the same time. However, I must stress that you have to keep your area clean, free of food and water so that the roaches don't have dining options. Give them Invict Gold to dine on. The roaches do this sort of "heroin" stand using one or two legs to hold on to the wall, cabinet, whatevs. That's when you know they ate the bait. You only need a small amount (less than half a tic tac) to do the job. It's better to use tiny amounts in numerous places as opposed to lines or big globs. Put it where you see the most evidence.
customer_reviews.author: Doin' Just Fine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing if used with a growth inhibitor
customer_reviews.text: This product is hit or miss it is usually amazing but I have noticed that sometimes it gets rid of the roaches and sometimes it doesn’t work at all! The first time I used it was several years ago probably about 6 and it worked great when I used it with gentrol (also great just not by itself) my friend was infested and they tried everything but no luck! I researched and read a ton of reviews on all kinds of different roach killer and this is what I came up with! I want to give it 5 stars but since you have to use it with the gentrol I don’t think it’s worth 5
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stone

customer_reviews.title: Brutal Harvest
customer_reviews.text: An army of German cockroaches invaded my homeland recently. I went from seeing one here and there to their scouts crawling on me at night. I received my Invict Gold yesterday. I placed drops from two of the four tubes at 7PM and hunkered down in my bunker for the night. I arose at 6:30AM to a brutal harvest. I was a victorious general walking across the battle plain. The bodies of the slain enemy everywhere. Total war. Carnage. Disgusting and exhilarating at once. I'm sure there are outliers hellbent on seeking revenge - What they don't know is - I have yet two tubes of Invict Gold.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Craig

customer_reviews.title: It’s working
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this brand. I used to go with advion roach killer but it wasn’t effective anymore. I wasn’t seeing any roaches die. I decided to give this one a try from reading positive reviews. It’s been 2 days of applying this product and it’s working! Every morning I wake up seeing dead roaches on the kitchen floor and behind the fridge. Some roaches are “drugged” and makes it easy to kill. And I haven’t finished one tube yet! Will update if anything changes. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if neighbors are using the same bait, but this just didn't produce noticeable results. I've used other baits in the past and they were attracted immediately to where It was applied. However with this bait it seemed to dry fast and not attract. I'm still left with a major issue. I'm unsure if the pests have become immune to the contents. Like other baits, they only include one tip. For the price, there should be more for every tube. I'll be going back to my regular pest control bait.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Sugarbaker

customer_reviews.title: there aren't words for how happy i am that i bought this
customer_reviews.text: wow works great there were four spot in my house that we were seeing them the most days after putting this stuff around we star seeing the dead or shaking bodies its been a whole month and we haven't seen one. they give you way more than you need i didn't even us the first tube yet. im just glad i saw this on youtube we wasted so much money . smoke bomb, raid and sticky traps
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T

customer_reviews.title: You want be disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: You want be disappointed!!! I was skeptical about this purchase in the beginning. I honestly was down right surprise that it actually worked. I've had it about a month now, and 99% of the roaches have disappeared. It started to work in a coupler hours and it's been a month now, with a baby roach here are there I see dying because of the gel. It's works and I haven't saw anything in the market that has come close to this in recent years. I say try it people...
customer_reviews.author: Pookie_Pook

customer_reviews.title: I buy this on a regular basis
customer_reviews.text: Amazon knows, and I hand it out regularly...to the people in my building, to my friends , to my family , to complete strangers ..literally. I live in apartments, all my neighbors get one, they must think me insane. Every month or so I need to reuse, then I hand them out again, please...use this...I say. I'm considering it as a stocking stuffer this year. Yes, I'm serious.
customer_reviews.author: Kitena Suttles

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't eradicate problem
customer_reviews.text: I saw less roaches after using this product but it didn't eradicate the problem. I want NO ROACHES, not less roaches. After using it for months now and re-applications, I still saw a roach today on my wall... so this doesn't solve the problem. Less roaches may be due to weather, better hiding spots, I don't know... but because less roaches I'll give this 3 out of 5 stars. Going to try a different one and see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: Ling

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of them Cockroachs quick
customer_reviews.text: No one loves having to use this stuff but I can tell you this will get rid of the roaches. We followed the instructions to the tee and product worked as advertised. We caught them early so we didn't have a major infestation but once I pulled some panel's off and located the area's they were gathering we knew we had a problem. We used the InVict in combination with Gentrol Point Source IGR Insect Growth Regulator in our 34 ft travel trailer. After all Roaches were dead we followed up with Diatomaceous Earth which I understand will prevent them from returning.
customer_reviews.author: LarryD

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money bugs will not eat
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this product at all. I did quite a bit of research prior to purchasing. I am trying to help my mother in law rid of her german roach infestation. I placed this bait by a visible nest with a bunch of roaches present. They will not touch this product. Due to the intensity of the infestation I assumed at least a little bit of the bait would have been eaten over night but it remains untouched on day 3 and I can still see live roaches present right next to the bait. Returning. Another rip off. Be sure to filter reviews to most recent. I've found a lot of these products have changed ingredients over time.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Where do these reviews come from?
customer_reviews.text: I just don’t understand how this product received all these five star reviews. I read them and was so excited to finally find something that might help alleviate my roach problem in my apartment. I applied as directed and absolutely nothing happened. I had read in one review how purchaser had dispensed product into the lids of water bottle tops and could visually know how much of the bait was being consumed. Well guess what..........I could see that NOTHING had been even touched by the roaches. I don’t know if this review will even make on line to be read. But trust me, I don’t understand all the glowing reports. Save your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn C. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to keep away from pets ..
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about another product,but had used diatomatous earth and it worked well but I was tired of powder everywhere and still having bugs..After two weeks of putting this out I was having dead roaches all over the floor and no roaches running around the coffee maker...Two months later..No more bugs.......great stuff..gave some to friends and same thing happened..no more bugs...I will continue to use it if ever need again..
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Effective 1000 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This product works extremely well what continue to buy and also referred it to my father. When I moved into my new apartment surprisingly it was infested with cockroaches to the point where I was contemplating on breaking my lease they came and did pest control for 2 months with no results I did research found this product used it and have NOT seen ANY ROACHES for 9 months and that's only with two applications 4 months apart
customer_reviews.author: Daughter of Zion

customer_reviews.title: BUG FREE FOR THE FIRST TIME IN 20 YEARS
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders 👌 we've struggled with cockroaches since I was a kid, not one house we moved into didn't have cockroaches. We would always use Reid and spray everything down but the dang bugs would not go away. I bought this because I realized that spraying a chemical all around the house was not very safe for us. I put this stuff in all the corners of the house, the cabinets, the rooms and the closets. I kid you not within a month we started to see a major difference. Now 1 year later I'm proud to say we are 100% free of cockroaches. Not a single roach has been spotted in the house. Amazing product definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: rrojoks

customer_reviews.title: Kills roaches and keeps them away!!
customer_reviews.text: This gel cockroach killer works wonders! Its not like the normal roach killers that you buy and it saves you the hassle of having to use a bug bomb in your home. If you use the gel correctly you will begin to see roaches that are dying or dead within a matter of 24hrs. The gel draws the roaches out of where they are hiding and once they eat the gel they begin to die. This roach kilee saves you so much time and once the roaches die they are gone for good. It not only kills the roaches on the spot but it fights to keep them away as well!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Alexander

customer_reviews.title: The BEST most RELIABLE roach killer of all time!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've spent over $200 in roach spray and this $27 item and within 3 weeks it took over 3-5k roaches gone. I've bought so many other products that were a waste of my time and money. I have never come across another roach killer that is more effective with such a short amount of time. Reduced the infestation by 95%. This is a miracle worker. Bank for your buck. Worth so much more for the effectiveness. It is amazing and I recommend it to everyone with an issue with roaches!!
customer_reviews.author: Joann L.

customer_reviews.title: Next,!
customer_reviews.text: Im not seeing any positive results from this product. We moved from an infested environment and have been working hard to make sure that any roaches that packed up to move with us were exterminated. I had high hopes this would help combat the bugs before they become a problem but I'm not seeing any evidence that this product is killing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Moved into an apartment and within a couple months it was evident there was going to be an issue. Called the building maintenance and they came out a few times. I used other products I found at the store and the problem kept getting worse. I found this online and after a little over a week I have not seen a bug in months!! I have another package of this in the closet for when I need to reapply. I will never ever not use this again! From now on wherever I move I will put this down before I even move my furniture in! Must have for apartment living
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Forget the exterminator, this actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and very effective! I had spent couple thousands on bug spray and exterminators because of a nasty neighbor. The problem wouldn't go away. I got this stuff, put it down, and the next day it was like a a miracle. They were dead. I need to do another round because this doesn't get the babies but you can get them when the babies become adults. I wish I knew about this stuff long ago. I would have saved so much money. If you have an infestation, I can't recommended this enough.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: can't find a Cockroach now
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Cockroach gel ever, I moved into a house infested and no matter what I tried they were still there! I bought this and used very little and it has worked, can't find a Cockroach now!!
customer_reviews.author: CINDY

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it now.
customer_reviews.text: The only good roach is a dead roach and that's exactly what this product delivered. Roaches walked mere inches away after feasting and were already dying. I used in conjunction with IGR discs and pheromone traps and with 6 weeks I no longer had a roach problem. It's been 3 months and still roach free!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: It works like an Atomic bomb for roaches!!️
customer_reviews.text: One tube if it’s a slight infestation. Two tubes of it’s bad. Place “pea sized” dots in key areas and don’t kill the roaches when they come eat it let them eat in peace... In hours you will notice a difference, in days those pests are gone.... if you’re smart put it on little pieces of foil for easy clean up. I’ve used this stuff for my friends and family with great results... I know this is a lengthy review but I know how embarrassing it is to have roaches and this stuff is the bomb
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Effective product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to treat a bad roach infestation. It absolutely works.. after about a week, there were dead roaches everywhere. I recommend that you clean all areas to be treated thoroughly, and follow instructions on package.
customer_reviews.author: Tigersoul

customer_reviews.title: Works fast, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow...this must be seen to be believed! Sorry, but I despise roaches, hence the purchase. I tested it out near the ground utility boxes/drainage ditches where they all seem to congregate and boy was I surprised. I placed dots of this stuff all around the grates and by the time I reached my starting point, they were coming out to eat it. Yuck! The next day...lots of dead roaches! Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but they're not gone
customer_reviews.text: I had traps, home spray, a different gel and no results... I used this and I see dead ones all over. My neighbors moved out and I inherited their roaches. I used one tube then a second a few days later cause I saw to many running around. I don't know how long they're attracted to it after its out, but I still have them running around. I'm waiting two weeks till I use the third tube so I'll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey  Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Intruders be gone.
customer_reviews.text: With an infestation as disgusting as roaches no one ever wants to admit that they have them. But honestly this stuff didn’t kill on contact but it did make the appearance of them drop drastically. The dog loved it too but she’s still alive. Placing the sticky traps around with the bait most bugs went into the traps still alive but there were random carcasses laying around other places too. Firmly believe this product was worth the money and helped my home invasion.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feeling
customer_reviews.text: They after nearly a month are crawling out of every nook and cranny of my house to die. I don't know when it will stop. I think they are coming from far and wide cus before this i only saw a few here and there. But now every day I come home from work to my house being littered in roaches dead ones. If I ever use it again I will put it on my neighbors house to draw them over there instead. I'm pretty sure every roach in 30 square miles is coming to my place to eat this poison. Not sure how i feel about it yet. Maybe I used to much, I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really worked. I moved into a new apartment ...
customer_reviews.text: This really worked. I moved into a new apartment and although they sprayed several times I still saw a couple of roaches, I purchased this gel and put it down everywhere in the corners and at first I thought there were loving it but they were coming out and just dying and in less than 4 days I didn't see any. I only used 1 of the 3 tubes that came. Use it periodically as maintenance but since using I have not seen any roaches at all.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Roland

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: This didn't do anything to help with the roaches.its like they ran from it,won't buy this brand again.also it was so hard to get out of the tube like it was really old and almost dried up.
customer_reviews.author: cinape

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT DESERVES MORE THAN 5 STAR!!!
customer_reviews.text: By far the only insecticide/bait that works. We been having big problems with german roaches. I hated it so much. No matter how many times I call for pest control to fix it, use so much bait and everything I can buy in hope to get rid of these suckers. None of this fix my roaches problem. Finally search on amazon, came across this brand, read lots of good reviews and I was like why not try it. And oh boy THIS DID NOT DISAPPOINT! IT REALLY WORK! FIRST APPLICATION IS ALL I NEEDED. I AM SO SO THANKFUL FOR THIS PRODUCT! AND FOR SURE WILL KEEP BUYING FOR MORE. THIS PRODUCT DESERVES MORE THAN 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Code K1

customer_reviews.title: No more roaches
customer_reviews.text: I had roaches in my kitchen & nothing seemed to get rid of them & I didn’t want to use a bug bomb. I got this & it worked very well. After the initial application I saw more roaches than before. I kept reapplying it wherever I saw them; drawers, under the sink, by the stove, etc. After a couple of weeks they were all gone. They’re still gone months later!! For reference, I used about a tube and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Havent seen a roach since I put it out. I was only seeing one or two a week before, and I only put out about two dozen drops of this around my 1400 sq foot home and in the doorway leading into the garage. But in the months since deployment, I have not seen any bugs. Also put in my car, since here in Hawaii roaches love to get into your car, and it works there, too. Not a single roach, except a few dead ones.
customer_reviews.author: Frmrfran

customer_reviews.title: ROACHES IN MY APARTMENT
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a new apartment. Three days later I start seeing roaches. I was beyond tired of the inner city pests! Did some research used this in cracks crevices under refrigerator oven with Gentrol point source . It is the only thing I have ever seen work effectively and quickly! After a few weeks the slumlord called a professional exterminator and they also had a gel called Vendetta and some sort of spray. So since then I buy both and switched off and keep everything bleached down in my kitchen and baseboards through the apartment. Works really good!
customer_reviews.author: Lavonta Wells

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: I have the occasional roach in my kitchen - tried Invict and didn't see one dead roach. They would just walk buy the paste and not even chew on it. No wonder it doesn't work... they never eat it! I did return it to amazon - pretty easy to do. beats me why this got good ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Mike g

customer_reviews.title: Best roach killer!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, this stuff is the holy grail of roach killers. After moving into a new place with German roaches, I bought this stuff. I put it all around the house, focusing on the kitchen and bathrooms and within two days, I was sweeping up dead bugs everywhere. It works best away from heat, in little dots, in corners and under counters. After I mop/sweep I reapply, and haven't had any issues since I started using this stuff. Total life saver! 10/10 will buy again if needed
customer_reviews.author: EM McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with German cockroaches when my neighbors moved out. I scrubbed my place and used this product. Never saw another one. This box came with three or four tubes. It will last you forever. I used in three rooms and didn’t even go through half a tube. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J Stin

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for German cockroaches as claimed
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived opened,just ordinary card box in blue Amazon plastic envelope.i had tried before another product( please see attached photo).that item really worked. But when I tried invict,sorry to say it just sat there ( please see picture) and no cockroach even went to it. I am returning this item in good faith,that it did not work in my kitchen for German cockroaches as advertised. In
customer_reviews.author: KHURIDAR

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A TOTAL KILL
customer_reviews.text: Love this product....these German cockroaches wanted to be my best friend. No matter what I tried,they just would not go away....they would disappear for a while but to my amazement,they returned in a few weeks. Thanks to Pest Management Supply through Amazon, I found this "Rockwell Labs - Invict Gold - Cockroach Gel" and said bye to those nasty,smelly,fast breeding roaches....THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: michael boston

customer_reviews.title: You don’t have to cleanse everything every day.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not as cleanly as the other reviewers on here, I don’t have time to re clean the kitchen every time I come home. Luckily I didn’t have to with this insecticide. Just dab it in the general area where you’re having an issue and for the next couple of days you’ll find the dead roaches. After that they vanish. Feels good to finally find something that works .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's a good idea
customer_reviews.text: Im finding my self walking around the house putting this paste all over the place not an easy task you need to do it at least twice a week.. so for the price i paid for this product + labor it's better to get a post control pro to do the job for couple extra bucks
customer_reviews.author: zalmi dobry

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I applied it a long time ago and was waiting for the tons of cockroach carcasses some people witnessed, but they never came and I didn’t think about it for a long time. And then I saw the first cockroach I had seen in my house in a YEAR and realized it worked amazingly well!!! I HIGHLY recommend. My area has mainly German cockroaches.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a roach problem that’s really visible . Just one every so often. I live in an apartment and the unit next to mine had a problem. The tenant moved out in July. When I checked all the usual areas they might hang out and they were all clear . My next is pulling out the dishwasher and putting a tube of this gel behind there. I was recommended this product by a coworker and they swore by it. So I got it. I have no complaints and feel that if you had a problem w roaches it would do a good job. A person might need to re apply for any that hatch.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Restaurants use this in cracks, under cabinets, to kill bugs. A little goes a long way. Do not put near food or pets. Its a bait that bugs love to eat but is deadly to them. It cost more but works.
customer_reviews.author: John's wife

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS, IT WORKS, IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: it's now been 4 months and I still have yet to see another roach! I put it up about 2 months ago and since I've put up the invict gold i haven't seen any! I have had an issue with roaches for a while nothing i did truly helped, and I've spent hundreds if not thousands on other roach killers and bug services. But this works. I haven't even seen baby ones! I wish i would have found this sooner! But it i promise you its not a waste! I'll update again in a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Shynella

customer_reviews.title: Really please with how well this worked!
customer_reviews.text: No more chasing roaches after turning on the lights! Used the about a month ago and within the first week saw TANGIBLE results. Far fewer roaches and water bugs. Now I rarely see critters and on the rare occasion that i do, they are taking their last breath. Haven't completely used the first tube yet. Really pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: beejlang-Houston

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works!! No More Roaches!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a dirty person but my kitchen developed a big problem with little German roaches. Put this stuff out and within 2 days all were gone. I am on my second pack because I have given some away to friends. I put it in seams all over the house. Well worth the money. The only thing I wish is that it had a longer applicator that could be attached for those hard to reach places.
customer_reviews.author: catladyFlorida

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This does work! Within the first 24 hours, we noticed the larger roaches--we call them "kamikazes"--didn't necessarily die right away. It did take time ... they were on their way, though. All I'm finding now are dead ones, and it's only been a day and a half. My sister tried to see if it would help with her smaller roaches--German roaches, I guess--but she said it's taking longer. She did say they're getting less, but still have plenty enough.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Messy but works
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased a similar product before. Since we needed help with an insect problem we got this. The price is only okay. It is simple to use but a bit messy. However it does do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Reilly

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only stuff that I have used that kills all the roaches. I used it several years ago and didn’t see a roach for two years. That was at a relative’s house in Houston where the roaches can get a real foothold. When I started seeing roaches in the kitchen where I live now, I ordered this Invict again. It’s easy to apply, goes a long way and works!
customer_reviews.author: TexasYaupon

customer_reviews.title: Roaches not more. This is what the pros use
customer_reviews.text: Wow amazing product. I called an exterminator for my german roaches and they were going to charge me and arm and a leg. He said it would take 6 months or more. I used this as directed, And I was roach free within 2 weeks. No more surprises when I turn on the light at night time. Every year I add some and I have never had another issue. The exterminator stated I had a Moderate infestation
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Wow complete garbage roaches did not one single paste a waste of money the roaches rather eat 2 dollar paste that they love and kills them this stuff is expensive and worthless
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: In less than 48 hours, a German roach infestation (several dozen baby and adult roaches all over the kitchen at all times!) TOTALLY vanished! This stuff works! and you don't need but just a tiny - smaller than garden pea size - dab in multiple places to fix the problem. I even used this stuff in my garage where massive huge "Palmetto Bugs" and even mole crickets were everywhere (cat food and litter box areas) and I now have ZERO roaches - ZERO bugs! I love this stuff! Packaging could be better, no padding and the box was crushed. Fortunately, none of the gel tubes were broken. Rockwell Labs, please do better!
customer_reviews.author: BlueOrchid

customer_reviews.title: Material
customer_reviews.text: Been using about a month. The result just ok because those german coach roach is still there. May be for awhile. Note that you have to apply more frequent because the product will dry out and become hard
customer_reviews.author: tri m tran

customer_reviews.title: Truly, truly works!  They swarm to this!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! We found a few nests in some dresser drawers that were unused but next to cat food. Put some streaks in there, you could watch them absolutely swarm to eat it. The next day we were vacuuming up dead bugs by the hundreds. We have put several applications in there and have reordered, but it is an excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard E Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Made a difference
customer_reviews.text: Definitely would recommend. Takes about 2-4 weeks when you really start to see the roaches are practically gone. I only applied it once and it's been about two months. Although, I still see one or two here and there; this product made a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical but really works
customer_reviews.text: I had some tenants who left the worst roach infestation I had ever seen and I work at the dump after putting this gel everywhere they can possibly hide I started seeing them turn up dead everywhere and 1 week later there is almost none left I will defintly recommended and use this in the future
customer_reviews.author: jose ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure it’s working
customer_reviews.text: I think this stuff is working because I don’t see any roaches anymore! However, I don’t ever see the bait getting any smaller so I’m not sure if they’re eating it or not? But they must be if I don’t see any more German roaches
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It does not work as well as the other brand that I purchase. I would rather spend a few dollars more for 100% coverage.
customer_reviews.author: MarieLC

customer_reviews.title: The stuff does work but it may not solve your problem
customer_reviews.text: This product works but it's not the miracle cure. If you have a serious german roach issue, you will need a combination of products. I ended up going to my local do it yourself exterminator store. They actually sell this stuff there but use it with other products as a system. That's what it took for me to get rid of my roaches.
customer_reviews.author: Markster2

customer_reviews.title: The rascals staggered!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in conjunction with Gentrol Point Source IGR Insect Growth Regulator Discs, and the little rascals were eliminated. After ingesting the Invict, they stagger around slowly such that they can be squished without the buggers scurrying and hiding. I like the fact that each tube has a cap and the remains of the tube can be saved for future use. It took less than half a tube to get rid of the problem. I still have 3-1/2 tubes left. Hopefully, I will never have to use them again! However, please be sure to place the gel judiciously as dogs will readily eat this. Luckily, my 125-pound dog did not ingest enough to cause any harm.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not on counters
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! But I put it on paint stir sticks covered in mask tape so I can move the poison around and wipe counters. Tape prevents drying due to absorption. 12 inch & 6 inch sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Orin

customer_reviews.title: Great way to kill those nasty German Cockroaches
customer_reviews.text: If you have German cockroaches like many do in warm climates like Mexico or the Southern US then this will get rid of them. You have to be patient though as it does take a couple of months because of hatching new generations. Put it out at night and just a tiny little amount n each place, they don't seem to go for the large blobs of it, They ingest it and it kills them, if your lucky, they take some of it to their friends and kills them too. They are very resistant to spays and it won't kill many of them but this stuff will.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy 2217

customer_reviews.title: Instant death for earwigs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There's something so disgusting about earwigs. They eat anything from the flowers in your garden to living in your house. They will rear up their pincers to get you when confronted. Some years they are worse than others. I figured cockroach bait might do the trick and voila. It takes so little to see the little low forms of life with their feet up. You must pay attention to your four legged critters in the house, even though I could not detect anything attractive about the scent of the bait, my dog sure was interested. Bury the bait behind furniture or deep in crevices etc.... I am so excited with the possibility of controlling earwigs!
customer_reviews.author: French Roast

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that worked! Finally.
customer_reviews.text: When the weather gets warmer, and it often does in Southern California, we would inevitably see a couple of these creepy roaches pop up. But now... nothing. I finally saw one in the bathroom the other day but it was turned over and dead, RIP. This is a remarkable product! Only wish I knew about it when we first moved into our new house. At least now I know what actually gets rid of them, for good!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I'm finally taking back my apartment!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical at first... But man within an hour of applying it I was sold! I have a bit of an infestation problem but these little buggers we're swarming to the poison in that first hour. Maybe within 20 minutes after applying it they had a feast with the poison. After an hour all the roaches we're acting weird running in circles moving real slow some look like they were bubbling up like they were going to explode lol. I've never seen and a reaction to poison like this before I'm going to apply two more tubes in the morning. I'm very excited about the day 1 results.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Slow Remedy for German Cockroaches.
customer_reviews.text: Third week after I treated the kitchen and I still see the occasional cockroach! Dupont Advion is hard to find now-a-days and it's so much faster and a proven deterrent against German cockroaches. Back to the drawing board to find another fast-kill alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Burfoot

customer_reviews.title: Wiped out my problem overnight
customer_reviews.text: And for living in the trailer park in the Southwest Virginia for a couple years getting rid of cockroaches was a major problem. This is a must-have worked overnight couldn't believe how many dead cockroaches I found in the morning. After trying so many other products I was a little skeptical about it but this is definitely the best and only want to use for now on Invict gold is a amazing
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had a very good response from using this product tried numerous other products that they didn’t quite equal what this one had to offer of course as a caveat along with this is that eventually the infestation of roaches will develop a tolerance so you have to actually have a two or three different products
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I had been struggling with roaches for about 6 months since we had gotten flooded. I tried so many things. Even called the exterminator and they told me I would basically have to box up everything in the house before they came. I decided to try this product and within 1 week they were gone!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: #1 PRODUCT, WORKED IMMEDIATELY
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the Brownstone apartment I live in where we started getting un-invited house guests. This in combination with a few other products ELIMINATED all of them. Haven't seen a bug in almost a month and this was the main product we used. The following week of application we noticed dead bodies popping up, and now (3 weeks later) we haven't seen one single bug.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product- Does exactly what it says.
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is WOW!!!!! The first application I applied knocked out over have the issue I had with German Cockroaches. I am 1/2 way through the second tube and I am not seeing anywhere near the roaches I saw before. This product works outdoors and indoors. If you have a roach problem, this is the product you need!!!!
customer_reviews.author: a.austin

customer_reviews.title: Roach injections
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how long it takes this crap to work but so far its doing nothing. I used 3 out of the 4 tubes before receiving the replacement box.(was missing a tube) I have now started on the next 2 tubes with no improvement. Waste of money in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Glennette Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great outcome! I have tried everything! I have a lake behind my house and all types if insects get into the house. This is a huge blessing to me! Roaches gone and any other issues of fleas and ticks as well. Saw results within a half hour. 24 hours later saw bodies everywhere. 2 days later I am seeing more dying. Great combination for the outdoorsy home
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: VERY EFFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Put this all around the place in far corners and have seen a massive drop in the roach issue. DO NOT put it in places accessible to pets, my cats went nuts trying to get it. (they're fine) but pets will try and eat it.
customer_reviews.author: NikG

customer_reviews.title: Good product for German roaches!
customer_reviews.text: It really works, good product. Before I have tried the Syngenta Advion and then the Combat Max but they didn’t work for Germany roaches. This product kills a lot of them. Would recommend this product to everyone .
customer_reviews.author: Tim-Lee

customer_reviews.title: Gonna need another plunger! :/
customer_reviews.text: This product works on Palmetto bugs in the south. Reason for a lower review than 5 stars?? They send on plunger for four syringes. The plunger got stuck in the second syringe, making using three and four....difficult (imagine lots of #$#@!@#%%÷×@). Lots of dead bugs on patio and in garage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missi B

customer_reviews.title: Hurry and buy buy buy this product it works
customer_reviews.text: Roaches, we stay in apartment building and roaches I hate them things the more you clean you see them. I seen this product read the reviews like other. I tell you I give this product thumbs up. I laid this stuff down 2 days later I seen dead roaches. Going to buy a few more boxes keep on hand for when I move to my next place. Buy buy buy it works. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Happy

customer_reviews.title: I saw a suggestion about putting dots of gel bait ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw a suggestion about putting dots of gel bait on paper plates in high activity areas so I did the first plate and placed it by the time I had finished the second plate the bait was already working. By the morning carcasses were all over the place. Awesomeness can't wait to see the results tomorrow morning! Just don't forget to take the plunger out and save it for the next tube.
customer_reviews.author: brosia

customer_reviews.title: Got critters?  Buy this, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: If you have critters please purchase this! I purchased and put in all of my cabinets, kitchen and bathroom. I put it behind dressers and under tables and shelves. No lie, I have not seen one critter since...well maybe one struggling, but it's been a while since I put this down and I have had no visitors. Purchase and follow directions, I wish I knew about this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Excited FL

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Used in conjunction with gentrol discs. Still had German roaches. The only thing that worked was buying an industrial strength pesticide and a backpack sprayer along with cleanliness and diligence. This product just doesn’t work period.
customer_reviews.author: J.b.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Placed it in several areas of my house especially inside kitchen cabinets. The day after application, I found two dead roaches. It’s been over a week and I have not seen another roach. I didn’t have a huge roach problem to begin with but looks like they are completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

product_meta.title: Rockwell Labs - Invict Gold - Cockroach Gel - 4 Tubes
product_meta.description:
Lightning fast cockroach control

roaches begin dying in as little as 20 Min after eating the bait.


proven secondary kill

when roaches are exposed to carcasses & droppings of roaches that feature the bait.
feature_bullets: Roaches begin dying in as little as 20 minutes after eating the bait
Proven secondary kill when roaches are exposed to carcasses and droppings of roaches that ate the bait
Unique food grade attractants are intentionally different from other popular baits, making InVict Gold the ideal choice for bait rotation to prevent bait aversion
Formulated without the eight most common food allergens for sensitive applications such as food plants, schools, child care and health care facilities

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,014 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
